Title: Relates to placing limitations on initial regulated rents
Summary: Places limitations on initial regulated rents to not exceed the average rent for a comparable rent regulated housing accommodation.
LawCode: Amd ยง6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-512, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 576 of the laws of 1974, constituting the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to placing limitations on initial regulated rents
